tag-ref-description: TagRef is a tag-oriented image browser that is tailor made for creators
auto-tag-desc: AutoTag enables the tag suggestion function, which automatically add tags to your images.
cache-desc: TagRef will store all the images locally (or in the cloud) if cache is enabled, however, this can take a lot of storage spaces and we recommend you leave it off.
twitter-link-desc: Connecting to twitter enables Twitter mode which allows you to browse only media tweets.
add-tag-field-hint: Type to add a new tag...
disconnect-gdrive: You are going to disconnect your Google account, are you sure you want to continue?
